website_summaries.verdict: An open steel-based design that seems to add space to the kitchen.
pros: We love the simple, timeless design and that it's comfortable and versatile enough for a couple or a party to enjoy a meal
While modern in appearance, it can enhance traditional design schemes as well
cons: A few reports that color is more muted than it appears online

customer_reviews.title: The assembling was really easy and I could build it up by myself in15 ...
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly, it arrived on time. The package was very heavy, needed 2 people to carry, but very well packed. The assembling was really easy and I could build it up by myself in15 mins. It was sturdier and bigger than I thought and at least 4 to 6 people can sit on it enough. I am so satisfied generally.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Kim

customer_reviews.title: My table was damaged
customer_reviews.text: My table was already damaged when I received the item. there was no problem with the package, but the item itself was in a very poor condition and I'm not satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Easy Assembly, & Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this dining table set. Sturdy, heavy (not flimsy) and of high quality. Everything came well packaged and protected from any damages during delivery. Every component was wrapped, cushioned and protected. The table and benches were individually packed into smaller boxes with ease of assembly in mind. Also, assembly was easy as it only took 1 person to assemble with minimal effort. I did not have to spend any time at all figuring out which legs are for the benches or tables. Every component was well made and precisely aligned for a perfect fit, unlike some other affordable self-assembled furniture I've assembled before.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Just a little better than target lol
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars for the design! It looks nice but its smaller than you think. We have carpet and when you sit, you feel like youre going to fall back! its not heavy enough to sit safely on carpet. I saw a review where their product was damaged, i got mine with a table corner slightly damaged like it fell with the corner facing the ground lol. The design is just what i wanted, but the quality is.. just a little better than those we get from target.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: Table top was smashed in the center. If it was only the underneath, I probably would have kept it. But it's BOTH sides! It looks like something heavy was dropped on it. We're able to return it BUT the only option we were given is UPS drop off - so now we have to transport this huge, heavy box to a UPS location. Total pain.
customer_reviews.author: SheShops

customer_reviews.title: DO. NOT. BUY.
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Should have heeded the other reviews advise, but decided to gamble and order anyway. The legs looked super cheap and 2/4 of the corners were smashed in like someone hit them with the hammer (completely unacceptable and not something you could cover up with putty and stain) and considering how well it’a Packed this has got to be due to a quality control issue at the warehouse or factory they are built/packed at Not to mention it has sheets of crumbly foam instead, which got everywhere and was an overall epic pain to repackage and send back to amazon. Just a major inconvenience across the board. Save yourself the trouble and money and find your table elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Emery

customer_reviews.title: It is a more dull brown than pictured
customer_reviews.text: The color is really misleading. It is a more dull brown than pictured. See that living room that this table is pictured in? It's that kinda brown. Also, one of the corners of the table-top is squished. I've seen this issue with other purchase-reviews here, and it seems like it's more of a shipping issue than anything. Also make sure not to slide the benches as that will dislodge the foam padding on the leg bottoms and risk scratching your floor. Happened for me, and so I gorilla-glued them back on and lift to move the bench. A bit inconvenient, but hey! it looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: DKim

customer_reviews.title: A solid table at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Feels very solid, and beautifully packaged. I love the look and thought the listing photos were accurate. There was a little surface damage on one bench, but nothing substantial. Assembly was quite easy even with only one person, although the box is extremely heavy. The frame doesn’t align perfectly with the drill holes, but I got all but one of the screws in by pulling on it a bit. I did find that some leg pieces didn’t fit together at first, but were fine when I reversed or switched them. Don’t be afraid to give them a good hit to get them together.
customer_reviews.author: Renaud

customer_reviews.title: I bought it anyways and I am soooooo glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I normally never write reviews, buttt because I was so nervous after reading other reviews on this table, I bought it anyways and I am soooooo glad I did. I’m 8 mo pregnant, and had no prob assembling it by myself. You don’t need the instructions or any tools. It’s super simple and looks great with my extra chairs on the ends 🤗
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, durable, looks good.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! The finishing on the wood looks very good. The metal legs are well cut and level. It was quite easy to assemble by myself, and the seller sent everything needed (except a screwdriver).
customer_reviews.author: Vivek

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this table
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect. 30 year old female. Put it together myself in about 45 mins. I was worried about the weight limit for each bench but I’ve had it for a few weeks and some family came over to visit there was at least 400lbs on one bench and about 525lbs on another. I was clenching my teeth the whole time think it was going to collapse or something and it held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Bench foot pads keep falling off
customer_reviews.text: The table itself came in good condition and was easy to put together. The benches also. However, my main complaint is the fact that the little black foot pads that came with the benches had the weakest adhesive. They would just not stay on the bottom of the benches. This makes the benches wobbly and we've already had at least 5 instances where my children accidentally flipped the benches while getting on or off of them in the first month. I'm just waiting for the day the benches slam on their fingers or something when they flip over. Kinda sketchy! Otherwise, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: J Moons

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good quality. I wasn’t looking for anything expensive and i have very little space for a bunch of huge dining chairs. I was very pleased to find this! Has a modern Scandinavian look and was super easy to put together! You’d think it was from ikea! The kids love the benches and it keeps them at the table for their meals. Easily fits four people. We’ve saved so much space that we can easily fit two end chairs for more guests! Definitely recommend if you have a small budget and small space for a dining table
customer_reviews.author: StormyMoon

customer_reviews.title: A little banged up...
customer_reviews.text: The sides were a little bent and the covering was ripped in some spots. it's certainly still usable and sturdy, but if we have company we need to through a tablecloth over it. It was easy enough to put together, it took me about an hour. The legs are U-shaped and are then inserted into the top portion and secured with screws. One side had no problems with fit, but the other side, well it was a little lopsided at first. I had to give the piece a good stomp (it was laying with the table portion on the ground) to get it to fit, but once it did there were no other problems with putting it together.

customer_reviews.title: NO quality check of product before shipping.  Holes are clearly not lined up.  Why predrill if they don't line up!
customer_reviews.text: the table would be great except the predrilled holes do not match with the frame at all. Out of all of the hole we could only get screws in 3 holes. Too heavy and expensive to return. Terribly disappointed. The benches are great but the table itself is barely secured down to the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Fowler

customer_reviews.title: assembly was very easy and quick
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant making this purchase as there were many reviews of damaged products, but mine didn't have any damage. Although the package was heavy, assembly was very easy and quick. It took less than 15 minutes without any extra tool. Above all, when assembly is done, it looks so simple and modern. Overall, I am very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eun Hye Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple table
customer_reviews.text: Great little table. Very basic, but that’s the intention I think. Can easily sit 4 people. Mine came damaged on the under side of one of the benches. I never did anything because I needed it immediately for a dinner I was holding. With how many Zinus products I have bought with no issues I’d say it’s not a huge deal, however I wish I could get a discount off of what I paid, or credit towards something new for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Barner

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy that I decided to buy this table! I absolutely love it! Not only was it wrapped very secure and all of the parts came labeled, but the instructions were very clear and it only took me about 30 minutes to put this table together by myself. I am so happy that I bought it it’s really sturdy and it can fit about 4 to 6 adults and it actually is such a great product. It is heavy to pick up once it arrives in the box so you will need another person to help you but it’s definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mimilatrice

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this table. My husband loved how easy it was to build and I love how great it fits our space. I wanted a functional multi use table for our space and this nailed it. I am able to seat six by adding two chairs to each end or maybe even 8 depending how large your crowd is. To clean it I use lysol spray on a Terry cloth, leaves no streaks. Definitely lift the bench up when your sliding it bin or out from under the table.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Easy assemble, and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: After ordering and exchanged for a different one, I finally got one we could assemble. I love it and it allows me to have to much more space in my kitchen. It is very easy to assemble, little to no instructions needed. The bench seats are perfect height for the table, and very sturdy! You can easily push in the seats underneath the table to allow more space. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Missmami

customer_reviews.title: Great quality made. Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's new home. He wanted something small for his dining area and this is what he chose and is very pleased with. After he assembled it I went over and sat at it and have to agree, it’s a perfect fit for his small dining room, although he could have fit a bigger table, this one was still perfect. Strong sturdy feel to it. Not cheap quality at all so I’m certain it will last.
customer_reviews.author: alisabellos

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this dining room table but the level of difficulty assembling it was too high.
customer_reviews.text: The legs were the only thing that needed to be attached to the table/seats. Based on the instruction you had to match the color triangles together. Well on 2 different occasions the color code was wrong and thus the piece wouldn't fit. I had to use a hammer on the iron to make it more narrow in order to slide into the slots on the leg. Sign This extra step turned me off to loving this table. I will say that its sturdy, easy to clean, and fits nicely inside a nook in my long rectangular kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: beautyqueen

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Omg, of all Amazon purchases we’ve made, (and we make a lot)— this is by far my favorite one. This table and the benches— I’m so in love with them. Have 2 kids, very easy to clean and manage. So glad we ditched our old table & chairs and upgraded to this. Doesn’t leave cup rings, any food left on it pops right off. Best- table- EVER! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: megan hicks

customer_reviews.title: Nice table but had 3 issues with it.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it took a while for delivery, almost two weeks. 2nd, thereis a while where 2 holes are not aligned to fit like a puzzle so instead of screwing it we just put a cardboard. Hard to return because of the long wait, we will have no dining table for Christmas if we do. 3rd, the corner is damaged. However, it is a beautiful table. Just risky cuz you don't know what to expect when you open the package, if it's going to be a good table, or have defects. :( Quality control should be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up..you'll be pleased
customer_reviews.text: It's just perfect for the four of us! You can add a chair or stool at each end if you wish.. if you have a small family and or small dining area this is the table for you! It is so simple to put together maybe a whole 10 minutes of your time and very sturdy and at the end of the day the benches can be slid under the table when not in use if you wish! I am very pleased with this purchase and have received many compliments a lot of people love this table
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: I was looking dinner table set like this and i found this one . Price is so cheap but i read all review i was worrying about the item because everyone says it came up broken or damaged but I decided to buy it . Because it sold and ship by amazon . I know i can trust to amazon . I received few weeks ago and it's really easy to install it . It comes with install equipment. I can recommend you buy this dinner table .
customer_reviews.author: Burock

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This came with completely messed up! The table top measured too long, so that the holes didn’t align for assembly, and one of the bench tops came too short, so that there is a whole 2-3 inches of space between the end of the bench top, and the metal frame! This table is completely useless... except for one bench. To make matters worse, we couldn’t get ahold of anyone from the company, and Amazon was useless in helping. Now, we are stuck $200+ short and with a useless piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.author: Traci Duane

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews, I was really nervous about buying this set. It is shipped in an extremely heavy package, but is well padded. It took my husband and I less than an hour to put this together. I did a lot of research beforehand and couldn’t find a better deal as far as a modern, clean dining room table with seating.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Hintz

customer_reviews.title: Simple Design and Set up
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a dining table in a few years, so it was time. I didn't want to invest in something too expensive because I'm in an apartment so the price point on this was great. Love the farm house kind of style. Needed a friend to help slide some of the pieces into place, but it could definitely be done by yourself. The pieces weren't too heavy and there was barely any hardware. Finished putting it together in less than 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Holy smokes, what a wonderful dining set!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am AMAZED at the quality of this dining set. But it's also the little touches - the fact that the directions are brain-dead simple and then they even include a beautiful allen wrench to help assembly - unreal! This is clearly a company that thinks their designs through. I actually use this as an office-style desk and it works fine for that. This is a GREAT deal and a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Florida FTW!

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table for a small apartment since the seats fit under the table. This was the easiest assembly I've ever done. IKEA WHO WE DON'T KNOW HER ANYMORE. It is a little wobbly but not to a point I'm worried about it, just sometimes I notice it isn't rock solid which if you expect that for this price....please adjust your expectations.
customer_reviews.author: DMoSwo

customer_reviews.title: Great small space table
customer_reviews.text: After ready the reviews I was afraid of ordering the table but I went ahead and ordered it. I am happy I did because for the price this table is pretty awesome!! It was super easy to assemble by myself. Zinus has pretty awesome products for the price. I am happy with this table. Its sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Roman The Great

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this table not too small or not too big. It's perfect I haven't had any issue with it. No scratches or dings when it was delivered, I assembled it by myself under 45 minutes..you just pop the legs into the seat a few screws...the pop the table top into legs a few screws and you're done. Love it , so yes you should buy it. Although I did get mines cheaper then what it is listed at now.
customer_reviews.author: Beauty of Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Zinus
customer_reviews.text: Zinus... if you like the pic, this brand is the EASIEST to put together and is exactly as pictured. Love Zinus and will look for this name on any piece I may purchase in the future
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: I love this table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! It works perfect for our little apartment. It's so modern and space saving. I love that the benches slide right under the table perfectly. It was so easy to put together and is surprisingly really great quality for the price of it! I definitely recommend purchasing! The ONLY thing I would say complaint wise is that it's a little uncomfortable after sitting on it for more than 30 minutes to an hour, but most things are like that anyways
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set, came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, smaller than I expected but it’s a nice little dining room set. Easy to assemble, but I did notice that one of the corners of my table was extremely damaged from out of the box. I’ll have to try and fix it with some black paint because now I can’t stop noticing it.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Actually much nicer than I was thinking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table just as a cheap alternative to what I currently had. With that said I had never counted on it being a sturdy and heavy as it is, in a good way. I have had at least 450 lb on one of these benches and was still sturdy as a rock. The material is very durable and easily cleaned. I was planning on this holding me over for a year or so, but honestly, until I can afford something ridiculous, I can see no need to replace the table. Took me and a roommate maybe 45 minutes to put together including clean up. Even comes with all necessary tools
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Good for small dining rooms
customer_reviews.text: For how inexpensive this table is and how compact you can make it in a small dining room, it’s worth the money. It arrived a little late (probably due to the size of the package) but it came undamaged. If you have a small dining area this is a great alternative!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Allen

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable benches
customer_reviews.text: The table looks very nice and was super easy to put together. I’ve had it for a year so far and it’s still sturdy. However my butt hurts a lot when sitting on for like longer than 30 minutes. Me and my roommates all absolutely hate this table now because how uncomfortable the benches are. It’s a good price if you want a table with seats you don’t to sit on much and want to look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amit

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. It was easy to put together and it is sturdy. There is enough room on the benches for 3-4 people. It does get fingerprints on it very easily. My child sits at the table a lot and I feel like it’s always covered with prints. A quick wipe with a damp towel easily removes any marks though. I would buy this over again. It’s a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great table that is easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: The table and benches are easy to assemble, and comes with all the required tools so you don’t have to worry about buying tools. The table is a plastic material that imitates wood but from further away it looks very nice. There is zero wobbling despite my floor being uneven. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Table is fine buttttttttttttt.......
customer_reviews.text: Table is sturdy and nice. However the padding cushion on the bottom of the table and chair falls apart. They are basically just stickers patched on to the metal. Other than that its just an OK table.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Simple, nice, and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I’m not one to leave reviews often but this table set is simply perfect. I just moved into a new place and it fits perfectly into a kitchen. It came in a big box but not too heavy. I was able to assemble it by myself (120lbs woman) in less than an hour thanks to the great tools that came with it. I love everything about it. The delivery guy was nice enough to place it where I needed it which facilitated the set up. This is definitely worth your money if you’re looking for something simple, nice, and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Seynabou NDONG

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Looking but Functional
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy to assemble (comes with tools) Nice dark color Sturdy (though rocking on the benches not recommended) Simple and Minimalist Affordable Dimensions are True No damage to table Cons: Shiny cheap sheen on table Legs are metal (didn’t realize) Kept looking at Thrift stores but couldn’t find a better bargain. 1 week later I found a larger free 100% wood table at the dumpster a bit worn but sturdy. Retouching for our kitchen table and this table will be repurposed as a craft table. Still a great price, I just prefer wood which is more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: This table is AMAZING for $170, you can’t beat it. It’s super cute and stylish. Mine did not come with any scratches, chips, or anything like that and it looks great. The only reason I give 4/5 stars instead of 5/5 is because one of the benches wobbles and it’s really annoying. The holes they made so you can screw it together were not aligned so there’s no way to fix this problem. But not the biggest deal... It’s more than what I expected for the price and would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for dining room kitchen table
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for dining room kitchen table. Could be used as bar table when chairs are inside. Amazing fit for 4 people dinner table. Luv color and size. Very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Han Ju Lee

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged and easy to put together. It can very quickly! I was able to put this together by myself. It’s very sturdy & very beautiful. Great for a a smaller space. Looks beautiful in my home. Definitely worth the price. I’d purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Dmartin

customer_reviews.title: Two orders- both defective
customer_reviews.text: We bought this table and when it came one of the benches couldn't be assembled. The holes were drilled wrong and the metal frame didn't connect correctly. We ordered another one with the thought we could replace parts and send it back. When the new table was ordered, it too had defects. We are going to send both back. We tried contacting customer service to see if they could just send parts, but they couldn't. Don't was your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Goose23

customer_reviews.title: Rubber leaves a black mark on floor.
customer_reviews.text: Good table. I have no experience assembling things by any means but they made it easy. You just put the parts together and screw them. All the screws and the material to tighten them is included. Unfortunately, the rubber that goes on the foot of table and bench leaves a black mark when you drag the them across the floor. It's hard to clean it up. The pricture I provided is just a small area of a long black line :(
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The table looks beautiful and is perfect for my small eat in kitchen. The stools are very sturdy and hold my 280lb husband. The table is stable and doesn’t scratch easy. Assembly was fairly simple and took my husband about 30 minutes. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Dana English

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: This set looks great and was very easy to put together. Gave 3 stars because one leg of the table did not fit at all into the holder. I had put the benches and other parts of the table together easily but that last leg just wouldn't work. Other people tried to fix it for me also with no luck. As is stated in multiple reviews it is just too much to deal with to try to send it back to the company so you're just kinda out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: RN-KR

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set thinking it would be a great size for my small apartment. It definitely fits well and looks nice. Assembly was really easy, so no need to book someone to assemble it for you. The table is pretty sturdy. My only complaint is that the benches are not even, so when there is no weight on them, they wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Corrales

customer_reviews.title: A simple and sleek look !
customer_reviews.text: A simple and sleek kitchen set. We live in a small home and it takes up just enough space. Two people put it together but one of us could of easily put it together. It comes with very simple instructions! We are happy with our purchase. It is perfect for a small/medium sized home.
customer_reviews.author: Raijene Walker

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy
customer_reviews.text: This took longer to remove from the packing than it did to put together. My wife and I were slow and took our time, but it was incredibly easy and fast. Not sure about how sturdy the benches are, but the table looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Aregowe

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lil dinette set. It took 5min each piece to put together (it actually took more time to take off the plastic than it did to assemble). I highly recommend it. I’m using it in my basement for a game table!!!
customer_reviews.author: mandrill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install! Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Nice , easy to install, modern , perfect size , just what we were looking for There is nothing negative I can say ! Don’t think about it too much , if you like it I strongly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: It is a good and streamlined table.
customer_reviews.text: It took longer to unpack than to assemble. It comes with a mini ratchet and three textured thank you notes to thank random people that may compliment on your new table. I love how streamlined and sturdy it is! I hate furniture in general, but this table is the exception.
customer_reviews.author: ed lin

customer_reviews.title: Good table for price !
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price! Sturdy and super easy to assemble. Downgraded my 6 seater for this and don’t regret at all ... Probably will add two chairs on the end... color of table is close to black which I also like
customer_reviews.author: MykkaM

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded My Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I'm beyond satisfied with this purchase - fast delivery; simple to assemble; sturdy and stable; very sleek and stylish; great for the limited kitchen and dining space I currently have
customer_reviews.author: Lex R. Brown II

customer_reviews.title: Great piece! Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great for small spaces! Very sturdy. The only issue was it comes with sticker pads for the bottom for easy sliding and I guess so it’s not noisy and doesn’t scratch the floor but they slip right off the first time you try to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiyler Beakley

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Table is a little wobbly side to side, benches seem well designed. I was irrationally angry about all the packaging but table and benches came in good shape so I guess he 97.48 lbs of plastic did what it was supposed to do. Zombie dogs and 4 dinner plates for size reference
customer_reviews.author: Zc90

customer_reviews.title: Great table and benches
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't take up much space but has plenty of room for 4 people. Very easy to assemble. Only thing you might want to add is cushions for the benches as they are a bit uncomfortable to sit on for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: assembling it by myself was a complete joke and it looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is the little stoppers on the bottom of the legs have fallen off and left the glue on my wood floor. Other than that, assembling it by myself was a complete joke and it looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Worth it if you get it on sale.
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent table. I was worried by other reviewers who received a damaged product out of the box but mine arrived flawless. All needed parts were in the box and this was really pretty easy to assemble by myself. The table has a very slight wobble but is totally acceptable so long as it doesnt loosen too much over time. I ordered the espresso, it's nearly black. To me, it looks really good. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: OMG this has the be easiest assembly in the world! Super quick and instructions were on point. Super easy to understand and looks sooooo nice in our kitchen. Its great for a small space!
customer_reviews.author: Rim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy, sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small dinning room and this table fits perfect. It also holds about 500+ pounds on each bench. It was super easy to assemble also. Took me. And my husband like 30-40mins max.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Eazy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and works great for smaller spaces. Benches fit right under the table
customer_reviews.author: JD Goetz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My seven yr old granddaughter wanted this for Christmas... she loves it. I’m glad we got it, very functional and matches the dark wood in her bedroom set
customer_reviews.author: Andrea411

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: While the table itself seems ok, I am pretty disappointed with the benches. The biggest annoyance is the rubber pads that were glued on the bottom of the benches from the factory did not stay on even with minimal use. They came off in the first 30 days. I attempted to glue them back on with a Gorilla Glue but they will not hold. On my hardwood floor, this is not good. Also, one of the benches is uneven/wobbles a little. This was with careful, attentive assembly, too.
customer_reviews.author: J.T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I was able to assemble everything in <1 hour. Everything you need to assemble is included. My only issue so that the stickers meant to be on the bottom of the benches don’t stick well.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: I love this table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! I love the design, price, and it's a perfect size for our kitchen nook! The only downfall so far is that the furniture pads provided do not stick very well and so my floor is sticky from them coming off all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany L. Akemon

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control. Shipping previously damaged products
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived without damagaged packaging and had a huge chip out of the top of the table, which means quality control is poor. They have knowingly shipped me a damaged product. I am very unsatisfied!
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Great product horrible shipping
customer_reviews.text: Zinus products are great. I ordered two of these and they both shipped with heavily damaged boxes. There were multiple scratches and one of the corner on a tabletop peeled off. The product is very sturdy and minimalistic.
customer_reviews.author: ARSP LINK the YouTuber

customer_reviews.title: EASY PEASY
customer_reviews.text: Wish this was slightly cheaper. It was very easy to assemble they even give you a tool to use. I wish I had paid attention to the wood grain as the table and bench are in two different directions. It is noticeable. Works great for small dining areas.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Came chopped but so cute
customer_reviews.text: I really like the table very easy to put together! And it’s super modern and cute but the side is already chipped when I opened the box. It’s a good size but still fits well in my studio apartment. I wanna love it just super bummed it showed up already falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Dcay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table!!
customer_reviews.text: It was super easy to assemble and I love how the benches can go under the table if needed or pull out for company in the living room. The only reason I would give 4/5 stars on value for money is because part of the leg of table was broken. I did manage to screw in everything well in order for sturdiness to be successful. I love this table and the modern feel!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick S.

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: Is perfect for small spaces, very easy to put together and it’s well sturdy. The only but is that the benches are slippery so if you have little kids just be careful. I have a little one that slipped and fell.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS PROUDUCT WAS PERFECT FOR MY EATING AREA!! I'M 6 MONTHS PREGNANT AND IT TOOK ME 45 MINUTES TO ASSEMBLE THIS SET !! THEY EVEN SEND THE TOOL YOU WILL NEED!! I AND MY HUSBAND SAT AT THE TABLE LAST NIGHT AND IT STURDY ALSO!! I ALSO LOVE THE CARD, THEY PUT IN THE BOX, AND IT'S EXTRA SWEET THEY SEND YOU CARDS TO MAIL TO FAMILY AND FRIENDS. NOW I'M WAITING ON MY SUNFLOWER DECORATIONS TO COME IN BECAUSE THIS WAS EXACTLY WHAT I NEEDED TO GO WITH THE LOOK
customer_reviews.author: Angel Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Great table, disappointing benches
customer_reviews.text: Pros : Solid good looking table and benches, fast & easy to assemble. Cons: The rubber feet on the benches started coming off the first day. Can’t buy just the benches to match another Zinus Soho table.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, EZ assembly and great modern look
customer_reviews.text: Everything this company is Awesome! Quality and sturdiness is why I keep coming back to them. From the Mattresses to Kitchen Tables.
customer_reviews.author: MDS

customer_reviews.title: A bit small but still amazing and perfect for my apartment
customer_reviews.text: A bit small but still amazing and perfect for my apartment. The first piece arrived a bit defective but the seller promptly replaced with one that was perfect. Easy to assemble, a bit heavy but well packaged. Benches are cool too, I use the Benches elsewhere and got dining chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob.A

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured !
customer_reviews.text: This table was exactly what I needed for a small space! Perfect if you have a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Dining Set
customer_reviews.text: I love this dining set! For the price, the quality is unbelievable. The "wood" looks pretty real and the benches that tuck under really allow for conservation of space.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Good size bench table
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a table to use when people came over to bbq and for my kids to do their art work on. This table is a perfect size and I love how you can put the benches under the table to move them out the way. Also it cleans easy. It sits 4 adults comfortably. Totally worth the money and it’s affordable.
customer_reviews.author: lady solis

customer_reviews.title: Love this mini table.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great table. Lightweight but sturdy I the right way. 100% happy with this purchase. The designer made a great choice to allow the benches to slide underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Na Xu

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous making this purchase, because it had no previous reviews. The price is very good, and it serves the purpose for an eat in kitchen, small space. My husband assemble the table in 30 minutes, super easy. It's a mix between farmhouse and contemporary, I'm not a fan of the contemporary style, but I like it. It's functional for eating, doing homework and using as a desk for office work.
customer_reviews.author: Arelis

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set. It is sturdy however the pieces on the bottom that are meant to prevent scratching are only adhesive and came off within a few days. The wood color is also a little darker than the photo which was disappointing but overall a good set.
customer_reviews.author: abby

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It’s seriously the table of my dreams. I’m able to tuck the benches underneath for more room in my living room/dining combo and it’s so sturdy. It honestly looks sturdier than in the picture reviews! So easy to put together took me maybe 35-40 minutes and I’m so happy with the results. Very simple and exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Dylana Massey

customer_reviews.title: Works, but just barely
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it was to put together. Love how it fits in the tiny space in our kitchen. Wish it was a bit more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kurz

customer_reviews.title: Great looking table
customer_reviews.text: This looks great and was easy to setup. Took one star off as the stoppers on the bottom of the legs easily came off. Had to buy new ones to stick on.
customer_reviews.author: YC

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love it, easy to assemble, it's cute, actually bigger then I thought it would be. But the rubber pieces on the bottom fell off (which are easily replaceable) I just left them off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was skeptical but very pleased when got it all set up
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical but very pleased when got it all set up. Very sturdy & looks great in my apartment. Only downside was the rubber bottoms on each of the benches start to come off, but was an easy fix with some gorilla glue
customer_reviews.author: Jed M.

customer_reviews.title: Chipped :/
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, like other reviews, my item arrived chipped and dented :( i’m sad bc otherwise I would love it
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Anne

customer_reviews.title: Cheap particle wood
customer_reviews.text: Maybe dont use particle board and you would have a decent product. My corner was damaged during delivery. And i hate particle board.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Great little table, inspect before accepting!
customer_reviews.text: Great for small spaces, as the seats fit under the table. But table arrived with two nearly identical 1 inch gouges in tabletop, occurred during shipping, probably. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It arrived promptly, and was packaged in plenty of protective cardboard and styrofoam. Easy to put together, easy to clean, very sturdy, and a bright, clean look for my kitchen. It's plenty big enough for the kids to do homework and art projects on. I'm completely happy with this table and bench set.
customer_reviews.author: Tamar A

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Table is great. Very sturdy and easy to clean. The benches fit perfectly under the table. The manufacturer included free cards that i can send to friends and family. Im going to purchase 2 regular chairs to have at the smaller ends and it will look like a nice dining set!
customer_reviews.author: Kassh

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great table and benches for the price. Super easy to assemble and took less than 15 minutes. Great for small spaces and fits great in my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Everything looks how it does here. I give it 4 stars because the pads for the seats are terrible and came off in the second week. Felt tip pads from Walmart work perfect though.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Hines

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived destroyed with holes in it. Product was packed horribly and box was made of a soft cardboard, considering the item weighs about 100 lbs, there were holes and rips all over. Table top looks like cheap fake wood laminate and it's obvious even from a distance. Table top had chips of laminate knocked out of it, cracked sides and busted, split and frayed corners. I sent it back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: sls

product_meta.title: Zinus Louis Modern Studio Collection Soho Dining Table with Two Benches / 3 piece set, Brown
product_meta.description: Color:BrownThe Zinus modern Studio collection is an ideal combination of function and style. The Soho dining table set is sturdy, with black steel tubing and a surface panel with rich brown wood grain finish. The modern Studio collection Soho dining table set will add an elegant touch to any décor. Easy to assemble. Worry free limited 1 year warranty.
feature_bullets: Sturdy Steel frame with rich wood grain Finish
Easy to assemble. A surface panel with rich brown woodgrain finish
Table dimensions 48 Inches x 30 Inches x 29 Inches, Benches 44 Inches x 12 Inches x 18 Inches
3 piece Set includes table and 2 Benches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars753 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
